SELECT tp.company_name ,tp.public_bank_name ,tp.create_at,tp.public_ban_account_number,tp.uniform_credit_code FROM t_operator_detail_info tp WHERE tp.is_deleted=0 AND tp.company_name like #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
